name: High On Racing
description: High On Racing is an unique Retro Arcade Style Tactical Racing Game that will warp you into the sky to race against the time.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP with SP2 or later Processor: Intel Pentium Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 8600M GT DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 512 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 550 ti DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 512 MB available space

reviews.review_text: High on Racing... literally you're high on racing <-<  Why do i not recommend this game? its beacause after doing 5 levels  for real i tried like 1-2 hours to do those levels  its all done by bugs ...  You <-  >Respawn >Get on plate 'turn right' >go straight and die Next situation >you turned left >everythings goes allright >you crashes on invisible wall ... I don't recommend this game to anyone <-<
A game in which besides speed, tactics is also important. Great retro music raises adrenaline and makes you improve yourself result.
its really bad game dont waste your time
Pros: Nothing  cons: Everything   -10/10   Plus it was made like in the early 1800s or somthing :P
Looks like a game ripped right out from something on DOS, don't know if that's what they meant by 'Retro Arcade Style'. I'm just not feeling it
